About Us

An emotional communication tool for the remote team

Internal lets you know how your remote coworkers are feeling everyday so you know when it’s best to approach them, and them you. It substitutes the emotional insights you would get from body language during physical communication.

There’s a new era of communication being ushered into our lives and we’re making sure the human aspects of it don’t get left behind.

Benefits

Productivity

Get more done by knowing when it's best to approach your teammates

Communication

Lower the barrier for deep conversations and tight coworker bonds

Acceptance

Become aware of the underlying reasons you make daily decisions.

Add to Slack

Start your 2 week trial and add Internal to your Slack, no credit card necessary!
Have feedback for our team? We’d love to hear from you support@getinternal.co

You Work Hard. You Work In Slack. You Work Remotely.

Conveying emotions over virtual communication is very hard. Aside from flat out admitting that you’re having a bad day, there’s no other way to get the job done.

Internal facilitates this awkward part of talking about how you and your coworkers are feeling so that you’ll never have to question whether or not you’re getting on someone’s nerves or they just slept poorly.

You know emotions are important. They're just hard to gauge virtually.

Team dynamics are imperative to healthy culture. They’re also incredibly difficult to observe in remote teams because you can’t see how your coworkers are interacting.

Internal provides you with hard, quantitative insights around how your teammate are doing on a daily, weekly, or monthly basis. Due to the fact that Internal is built on top of Slack, you also have the ability to generate insights on the dynamics of specific channels.

Frequently Asked Questions

If you don't find an answer here, be sure to contact us - we're happy to help!

  • What is emotional fitness?

    Emotional fitness commonly means the ability to emotionally adapt to any situation. We tend to think of it from a much broader perspective. Emotional fitness to us isn’t a dynamic measure, that defines you and typically holds steady, but is static, reflective of your current emotional state.

  • How can you measure emotions?

    Emotions seem borderline-incomprehensible, but the extent of emotions are not. There is a huge difference between content and ecstatic regardless of the fact that they both fall under the umbrella of "happy". This is what we measure - The degree to which you are feeling an emotion.

  • How do I cancel my subscription?

    In the name of getting the product out to the market as soons as possible, we forwent all things that would slow us down - A log in and customer dashboard being two of them. For now, email support@getinternal.co to cancel your subscription, but in the future you'll be able to carry that out on the site.

  • Do you collect my data?

    We do, indeed, collect the necessary data to compute scores and things of that nature. For more information, feel free to take a glace at our Privacy Policy.

  • Can my manager see what answers I choose?

    Not personally - Team reports aggregate everyone on the team’s logs, meaning no one’s questionnaire choices are personally identifiable.

  • What if I lie on the questionnaire?

    This wouldn’t be helpful to anyone. In the instance that you lie (which, you’d have no reason to do — no one knows your answers but yourself), you don’t get authentic results and reports. That means you can’t accurately track your emotional fitness, and your manager’s concept of where the team’s headspace is at isn’t accurate!

Internal is the emotional nervous system of organizations - A network of emotional tracking and sentiment intelligence tools, created to eradicate professional agony and promote innovation through empathy, transparency, and acceptance.
